subject: RE: [junit] JUnit Test coverage - Statement complete
msgSnippet: Hi Eytan, ... never tested it, but you may give it a try and report here: http://quilt.sourceforge.net/ Regards, Jörg
messageBody:
Hi Eytan,

> I have a bunch of white-box Junit tests and I would like to check if I
> have executed every line of code with the tests. Not just every
> method, but every line of code within the method.
> Does anyone know of a good tool (hopefully free...) that
> works on Linux???

never tested it, but you may give it a try and report here:
http://quilt.sourceforge.net/

Regards,
Jörg
